LanguageData.RebuffedMyRomanceAttemptMood.stages.0.de: I attempted to create a romance, but I got the cold shoulder. Feels bad man.
LanguageData.FailedRomanceAttemptOnMeLowOpinionMood.s: Someone I don't like tried to romance me.
LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.label: broken up with by {0}
LanguageData.BrokeUpWithMeMood.stages.0.description: I was just dumped like a load of garbage.
LanguageData.CheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.label: cheated on by {0}
LanguageData.CheatedOnMeMood.stages.0.description: How could someone cheat on me!
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.0.label: divorced by {0}
LanguageData.DivorcedMeMood.stages.0.description: We made a commitment, and they just tore it apart.
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposalMood.stages.0.label: my proposal was rejected by {0}
LanguageData.RejectedMyProposalMood.stages.0.descript: I thought we were meant to marry. But I was just shot down.
